body:
hi
I am writing to you to ask you when the staff applications tab will open once again.Is it once every 2 months,random months.I know I sound like a noob here but i would really like to know.If you know please let me know in comments.

thank you,
regards
endergodx
body_tagged:
hi
I am writing to you to ask you when the staff applications tab will open once again.Is it once every 2 months,random months.I know I sound like a noob here but i would really like to know.If you know please let me know in comments.

thank you,
regards
endergodx
title: staff applications tab

replies.body: Currently, staff apps are closed. They are trying out hand picked staff starting in March. If that doesn't work, staff apps will open up again. :)
replies.body_tagged: Currently, staff apps are closed. They are trying out hand picked staff starting in March. If that doesn't work, staff apps will open up again. :)

replies.body: They are closed but do open roughly 3-4 monuths from the last time they did this time its going to be either hand picked staff or staff applications !
replies.body_tagged: They are closed but do open roughly 3-4 monuths from the last time they did this time its going to be either hand picked staff or staff applications !

replies.body: They will be doing hand picked staff as well as applications as Element said.
replies.body_tagged: They will be doing hand picked staff as well as applications as Element said.

replies.body:
No offense, but I'd say Avicus will be going downhill if they don't think before they pick random players.

replies.body:
As stated above, in mid-March, we will be trying out the hand-picked staff system.
But for staff applications, there is no set time limit between application periods.

They'll open when we need more staff. Not every 3 or so months.
replies.body_tagged:
As stated above, in mid-March, we will be trying out the hand-picked staff system.
But for staff applications, there is no set time limit between application periods.

They'll open when we need more staff. Not every 3 or so months.
